turns.speaker: Student
turns.content: So you have chest pain. When did it start?

turns.speaker: Patient
turns.content: About three hours ago. I was going up stairs at work and it just hit me.

turns.speaker: Student
turns.content: Okay. Is it sharp or dull?

turns.speaker: Patient
turns.content: It's more like a pressure, like someone sitting on my chest. It goes to my left arm and jaw.

turns.speaker: Student
turns.content: Alright. I think this could be a myocardial infarction. We should get a troponin and ECG stat.

turns.speaker: Patient
turns.content: A what? What does that mean? Am I having a heart attack?

turns.speaker: Student
turns.content: Possibly. A myocardial infarction is when blood flow to the heart is blocked. The troponin is a cardiac biomarker that tells us if there's myocardial necrosis. We need to rule out STEMI versus NSTEMI based on the ECG findings.

turns.speaker: Patient
turns.content: I don't understand what any of that means. Can you explain in simpler terms? I'm really scared right now. My dad died from a heart attack.

turns.speaker: Student
turns.content: Right. So do you have any medical conditions?

turns.speaker: Patient
turns.content: I have high blood pressure, high cholesterol, and diabetes. But I'm really worried â€” can you tell me if I'm going to be okay?

turns.speaker: Student
turns.content: We'll figure it out. What medications are you on?

turns.speaker: Patient
turns.content: Lisinopril, atorvastatin, metformin, and aspirin.

turns.speaker: Student
turns.content: Any allergies?

turns.speaker: Patient
turns.content: Penicillin.

turns.speaker: Student
turns.content: Okay, I think we have enough. Let me go order those tests.

turns.speaker: Patient
turns.content: Wait, don't you want to know anything else? You didn't even ask about my family or if I smoke.

turns.speaker: Student
turns.content: Oh right. Do you smoke?

turns.speaker: Patient
turns.content: I quit two years ago but I smoked a pack a day for 20 years.

turns.speaker: Student
turns.content: Got it. Anything else?

turns.speaker: Patient
turns.content: Well, my dad had a heart attack at 58. He died. That's why I'm so worried.

turns.speaker: Student
turns.content: Okay. I'll go order the tests now.
